oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: W. H. H. Benefiel correspondence with John T. Wilder, et. al., 1889 September 15
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Benefiel, W. H. H.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from H. H. Benefiel to Generals Hascall, Wilder, and Rosecrans declining an invitation to a reunion of Wilder's Brigade. Benefiel also describes his development of a register of the surviving members of the Indiana 17th Infantry Regiment as well as a regimental history.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:contributor: Hascall, Milo Smith, 1829-1904; Rosecrans, William S. (William Starke), 1819-1898; Wilder, John Thomas, 1830-1917
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865; United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865 -- Veterans
United States. Army. Indiana Infantry Regiment, 17th (1861-1865); United States. Army. Wilder's Brigade
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: John T. Wilder correspondence and papers, 1865-1937
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: John T. Wilder Civil War correspondence and papers
